articles.description: The once dominant e-cig company faces yet more legal challenges and FDA scrutiny.
articles.content: Enlarge/ A young man wears a shirt that reads DITCHJUUL while James Monsees, co-founder and chief product officer at JUUL Labs Inc., testifies before the House Economic and Consumer Policy Subcommitt… [+5105 chars]
